title: Cannelloni filled with spinach and ricotta
ingredients: ['Béchamel sauce', '1L milk', '50g butter', '50g plain flour', 'Cannelloni filling', '800g fresh ricotta cheese', '4 bunches fresh spinach, boiled in salted water, drained and finely chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1⁄4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 egg, beaten', '50g grated Grana Padano cheese', '1 box Barilla® Cannelloni', '1 jar Barilla® Ricotta Sauce', '2 tablespoons pine nuts']
